constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AAS Name: Settlement - Old Malden (1st recorded 1086)
NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided with regards to Condition 8 (Co2 & Water) of permission 22/02399/FUL with regards to internal water usage rates. Therefore the proposal fails to ensure the interests of sustainability and energy conservation, in accordance with policies CS1, DM3 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.The condition requires the submission of the followingPrior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, evidence showing that the development has achieved at least a 19% improvement in CO2 emissions versus Part L of the Building Regulations and internal water usage rates of no greater than 105L per person per day have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.Once approved, any measures necessary to meet the targets shall be maintained throughout the lifetime of the development.For any future submission please ensure internal water usage rates of no greater than 105L per person per day have been submitted.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Deatils required by condition 8 (Co2 & Water) of permission 22/02399/FUL (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of 2no. three-storey semi detached dwellings)
